intro: Dumasia zhangjiajieensis, commonly known as the Zhangjiajie dumasia, is a rare flowering plant species native to China. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its unique, ornate leaves and showy flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments within mountainous regions. Its botanical features include tubular corollas and a compact growth habit. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a valuable subject for botanical research and conservation efforts.
